name: Restaurant 1 : Pirate Cove Grill
description: Enjoy fresh seafood in a pirate-themed atmosphere! The Pirate Cove Grill offers a one-of-a-kind dining experience where you can feast on grilled fish, shrimp, and shellfish while surrounded by nautical decor. Feel like you're aboard a pirate ship as you savor every bite, and maybe even find a treasure or two hidden in the menu!

name: Restaurant 2 : Space Diner
description: A futuristic dining experience out of this world! Step into a sleek, space-age diner where you'll dine beneath holographic stars and planet projections. With a menu filled with 'galactic' burgers, cosmic shakes, and space-inspired dishes, every meal is an interstellar adventure. Ideal for space enthusiasts and anyone who loves a futuristic vibe!

name: Restaurant 3 : Enchanted Forest Café
description: Relax in a serene, magical forest setting! Enchanted Forest Café transports you to a mystical world filled with twinkling fairy lights, towering trees, and calming nature sounds. Here, you can enjoy a selection of herbal teas, fresh sandwiches, and organic desserts, all while being surrounded by the beauty of nature. Perfect for a peaceful, nature-inspired dining experience.

name: Restaurant 4 : Wild West Steakhouse
description: Savor hearty steaks in a Wild West ambiance. At the Wild West Steakhouse, you'll be transported to the rugged frontier, where the aroma of sizzling steaks fills the air. Indulge in hand-cut steaks, grilled to perfection, and paired with robust sides like mashed potatoes and cowboy beans. The rustic decor, complete with wooden furniture and cowboy hats, adds to the authentic Wild West experience.

name: Restaurant 5 : Galaxy Grill
description: Taste intergalactic dishes from distant galaxies. Galaxy Grill offers a truly unique culinary experience where every dish is inspired by different planets. From Martian-style burgers to Venusian salads, the menu is designed to take your taste buds on a cosmic journey. The futuristic space-themed decor and glowing neon lights create a vibrant atmosphere for guests to enjoy their otherworldly meals.
